body_html:
Yep, it seems that torch.Tensor cannot have more than 2^31 elements

require 'cutorch'
Tensor0=torch.CudaHalfTensor(16777216,128):zero()
result=torch.mv(Tensor0,Tensor0[1])
print(result[1])

Fine

require 'cutorch'
Tensor0=torch.CudaHalfTensor(16777217,128):zero()
result=torch.mv(Tensor0,Tensor0[1])
print(result[1])

Fails

body:
Yep, it seems that torch.Tensor cannot have more than 2^31 elements

```
require 'cutorch'
Tensor0=torch.CudaHalfTensor(16777216,128):zero()
result=torch.mv(Tensor0,Tensor0[1])
print(result[1])

```
Fine

```
require 'cutorch'
Tensor0=torch.CudaHalfTensor(16777217,128):zero()
result=torch.mv(Tensor0,Tensor0[1])
print(result[1])

```
Fails
